data.text: @EU_Commission wants to abolish #Summertime by abolishing #wintertime. Trying to fool us ? Keeping #summertime will only delay #globalwarming by one hour ! Let's go for #wintertime which is closer to #naturetime
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil My inner clock keeps ticking all the same
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Thought for the day, persuading the whole EU to standardise on GMT might persuade the Brexit headbangers to drop their objections to the EU? ✌️🙏

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil How’s about a good old compromise and moving our clocks to midway between the current winter and summer times? The Indians and the Pakistanis (and Bangladeshis) live quite cheerfully (?!) with half an hour time difference between their countries.
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil In which countries this consultation has been made? I have not heard anything about that in Italy! How come?
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil If the European Commission decides than please choose the summertime🙏🏻

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Could you please clarify, because I'm seeing all kinds of versions in media, whether the proposal will be 
a) Summertime all year long
b) Normal time all year long, or 
c) Each country to decide by themselves as long as they don't change time twice a year.
Thanks.

@EU_Commission @RoundLike @JunckerEU @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @A_WintersteinEC 4.6 million? That’s only around 0.5% of EU population. You really are a pathetic dictatorial cowboy outfit, aren’t you. No wonder people want to leave
@EU_Commission @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @JunckerEU @A_WintersteinEC Only humans care about this. Changing the clock time does not affect the rotation of the planet.

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Weren’t the majority of the votes collected from German people? How do we Irish factor in? 0.24 percent of the vote. Holding a poll is one thing. Using it for policy decisions I’m not sure about

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Absolute madness.  This should be based on latitude (and longitude) not on standardisation.  Clearly somebody with understanding of body clocks and process safety has come up with this one.

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil There are 508.2 million people in the EU. 4.6million responded apparently... Less than 1%. On top of that, not all of those people responded in favour of changes. Roughly 0.76% of the EU population voted in favour of changes. How democratic #brexit
@EU_Commission @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @JunckerEU @A_WintersteinEC I wasn't asked nor was anyone I know... Who was the 76%...?

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil I see EU is working hard at Problems we have now in Europe. and after the time let's ask about the weather. Why don't u make a consultation asking if we do prefer sun, rain, snow or fog?

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil That's a really important topic for the EU to deal with and fix! Go on changing people's lives in such dramatic ways! You will be taken so seriously given all the real problems the EU has...

@EU_Commission @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @JunckerEU @A_WintersteinEC BUT, do the people want constant summer time or constant winter time? it seems there is a misunderstanding there. no time change is good, but winter time is, imo, the best and smartest option. somehow the EU doesn't understand that...
@EU_Commission @EuropeanYouthEU @ChristianWigand What the fuck is this? Then you dare telling people budgets are limited! Fuck you!
@EU_Commission @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @JunckerEU @A_WintersteinEC If this is decided that means we will remain with summer time or?

@EU_Commission @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @JunckerEU @A_WintersteinEC So, in the summer we're going to be doomed to have sunrise at 4am? That's not very bright, is it? BTW, did you consider the possibility that only those having a strong opinion responded?

@EU_Commission @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @JunckerEU @A_WintersteinEC CET (GMT+1) is so much better than GMT. An hour extra daylight in the evening is great. Lots of benefits and very few negatives. Starting work & school, opening shops & pubs, voluntarily 1hr later is a solution and a plus for those against CET, IMO.
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Keep Winter Time - Why expect everyone to go to bed an hour early on Summertime, just so the working day starts sooner? #EUHaveYourSay
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Summertime should be kept all year around,

@EU_Commission @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @JunckerEU @A_WintersteinEC Ok, but it seems the proposal is to keep the summer time. I don't know in other countries, but at least in Spain that would be madness. In Spain we need to be in the current winter time or even London winter time. Please this has to be considered
@EU_Commission à quand un référendum plus "osé", pour l'arrêt définitif et immédiat de l'utilisation du glyphosate ? C'est prévu ça ? 👽
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil This is a farce!
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil excellent, maybe Canada will follow the same rule and stop changing the time
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Dis is The Epdemi and and Yuo Frands Faht From Fridem of the World yuo klok is Rihl dis al in From dis Pest OK Thank Frand MARZHL Canxxx
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil make the same consultation about ceasing the EU, you will be surprised.....
@EU_Commission @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @JunckerEU @A_WintersteinEC so the main concern is to change the clock? Then u criticize who says that EU is useless....
@EU_Commission @PabloPerezA @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Jonah Ryan was a true visionary @VeepHBO
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil 84% of 1% of the European population. Are you serious?
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil You mean they want them to be on Summertime all year round. Huge confusion about this.
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Yay 😊!

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil amazed by the priorities of the #commission ... don't we have anything better to think about than killing things with work? Any #federalistagenda in sight? c'mon ... #disappointed

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @A_WintersteinEC Why not asking about Juncker addiction.   Are you happy to depend to such guy ?
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @Europarl_EN thieves!!!
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Were more people in favor of using the summer time or winter time, if we were to stop changing time?
@EU_Commission Not very good at statistics are you ?
@EU_Commission Lying again ! Population of eu  - 510Million assuming half under 18 that makes 255Million eligible to vote WHICH MEANS only about 10% of eu population voted for change !!

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU we want #wintertime in the #Netherlands, not #summertime. In you're inquiry is only 1% for #summertime, but much more people in #europe wan the #witertime back. Let the people decide and keep an inquiry in every country!

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil So a f*ing manipulated poll is now your instrument of democracy? And acts as a basis for new regulations and even the change of 'time' itself? Do you seriously think we will accept this BS?
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Definitely the right track! Listening to EU citizens is the way to restore the Union. Looking forward to #SOTEU

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Please don't spend millions in discussing how to stop it.
Just don't change the f*cking time anymore, it's that simple.
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil It was only 84% of those who took the time to vote online !!!!!

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @A_WintersteinEC You should have done this before the brexit referendum, in Britain we hate losing 1 hour of daylight every day for around 5 months, Britain would have chose remain.

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @Bulc_EU @Transport_EU @A_WintersteinEC It might be the highest but still very low compared to the number of EU citizens not to mention the low representation of ALL EU MEMBER STATES
@EU_Commission @EBienkowskaEU @EU_Growth @LuciaCaudet Buy British.

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil And 17.4 million of us used our summertime consultation on June 23 2016 to go tell the EU other things. @RichardWellings @JonHolb @joneselizab @Article1066 @OTVDesk @petuniasforever @RealBlackIrish @ianbaxter_uk
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil I enjoy the long summer evenings. Then the clocks change just in time to enjoy fireworks bonfire and baked potatoes on Guy Fawkes night at a reasonable hour.
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @EUCouncil Still less than 1% of the EU population voted on that poll, still not representative.

@EU_Commission Chief @JunckerEU announces he will be proposing abolition of summer/winter time across #EU, as survey showed majority of #European citizens said they don't want it

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Mr Junker, calling Summertime the New standard is very unscientific. There is already a Standard Time, and you call it “Wintertime”. You are institutionalizing the exception, we’ll be adding an additional hour to standard time forever! Madness!

@EU_Commission What a db proposal is this!? If you want to abolish daylight saving that’s something we can talk about... but to say that now so-called Summertime is the new standard is MADNESS! Also.. Where did the respondenten of the survey come from?
